column14: Love this MAC lipstick! Really cute purple pink lipstick. Goes on really smooth. Normally the iconic Viva Glam is a red lipstick but not this year with Adrianna Grande. Viva Mac 100% proceeds go to supporting LGBTQ+ community impacted by HIV/AIDS since 1995
